original_title: Tropical Lagoons: Tranquil World - Relaxation with Music & Nature
overview: Take a virtual vacation by the water of a lagoon. Hear the roaring waves breaking against the reef in the distance, while walking barefoot along the soft white sand. Visit these beautiful scenes and listen to the music and sounds of paradise.
title: Tropical Lagoons: Tranquil World - Relaxation with Music & Nature
